title: Which are the best sites to give technological reviews? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a lot of sites are available for latest tech news and reviews, I am listing some of my favorite sites,u can check them.hope it will help you 1)Product reviews, how-tos, deals and the latest tech news 2)Mashable 3)The Verge 4)TechCrunch 5)TNW - International technology news, business and culture 6)Engadget 7)Digital Trends | Technology News and Product Reviews 8)TechRadar | The source for tech buying advice | TechRadar 9)Ars Technica 10)Technowize Magazine - Product Reviews, Technology News & Tech Events
